openexpo_solutions_title: Find the right solution for you with Openexpo!
openexpo_solutions_text: Imagine your online event with an UNLIMITED number of active participants, stands and booths from anywhere in the world without any restraints by space or number!
find_what_exactly_openexpo_title: Find what exactly Openexpo can help you with!
find_what_exactly_openexpo_text: There are a number of different ways that you can utilise our platform for. Whether you are hosting an exhibition, a webinar, a concert or a festival, we are here to help!
broadcast_your_success_title: Broadcast your success for people to learn from!
broadcast_your_success_text: As they say, "sharing is caring", that applies to the virtual exhibitions too! The more workshops you can offer to the broader audience the more knowledge will be shared with others! Take advantage of our features!
virtual_trade_show_text: Creating a trade show with unlimited number of workshops, exhibitor booths, sponsorship features is something we can do!
advanced_webinar_text: Adding a few perks on top of just a simple webinar gives an ability to the webinar organiser to engage the crowd even further
show_off_your_talent_title: Show off your talent or creations to masses!
show_off_your_talent_text: Apart from hosting a trade show, our platform allows you to host a film festival or a concert.
virtual_film_festival_platform_text: A lot of people sometimes are unable to visit the film festival, so we give an opportunity for the organisers to create it online
